message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $12,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $13,500 to make this worthwhile.  What do you say?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counteroffer at $13,000 for the product. I hope this is closer to what you're considering.
